name: youtube-speed-changer
description: An extension to change the speed of Youtube videos.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/*.* && npm run build:other && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.bump: npm run patch && npm run deploy:git
scripts.git:setup: git init && git config user.name 'travis' && git config user.email 'travis'
scripts.commit:all: git add -A && git commit -m 'chore(build): bump version and deploy [ci skip]'

author: Adrian Carriger <hello@adriancarriger.com> (http://adriancarriger.com)
